Description: Egypt or Israel, portrait of three female children standing outdoors. Wearing head-cloths, gowns full of apples which they are "selling". Desert [?] setting, groups of tents in background. Medium: Gelatin silver print.
Producer name: Photographed by: John Frederick Clifford Hunt
Curator's comments: Geography: Jubi and Bint not identified in sources. Unclear whether place or ethnic name. Circumstances: [HUN-] PIC DOC 66. The Imperial War Museum holds photographs from the same collection with a more military content - see [HUN-] PIC DOC 66.
